name: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

YOUR NEXT MATCH 3 PUZZLE ADVENTURE AWAITS!

SET SAIL ON A FANTASTIC JEWEL MATCHING ADVENTURE AS YOU ATTEMPT TO DISCOVER THE LEGENDARY TREASURES OF THE ANCIENT MAYANS. INCREDIBLY DESIGNED MATCH 3 CHALLENGES WILL PUSH YOUR PUZZLE-SOLVING SKILLS TO THE LIMIT AS YOU UNCOVER THE HIDDEN CLUES AND ADVANCE THROUGH INCREASINGLY DIFFICULT PUZZLES! SEE IF YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO UNCOVER THE SECRETS AND CONQUER ALL THAT LIES BETWEEN YOU AND THE TREASURE.
  • OVER 100 MESMERIZING LEVELS AND 7 DIFFERENT BONUSES TO AID YOU ON YOUR ADVENTURE.
  • POPULAR MATCH 3 GAMEPLAY FEATURES FOUR DIFFERENT GAME MODES..
  • 16 BONUS CHALLENGES INCLUDED FOR ONLY THE MOST ADVANCED PLAYERS
  • STUNNING BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS.
